Hear it from one of our own

"Being part of the process as the company has gone from four people to an up-and-coming force in the lottery world is something that I'm proud of."

James Maidment, Software Architect

We're looking for the best graduate developers

Why is Geonomics a great place for graduate developers to work?

Well, you’ll be thrown in at the deep end, with your first lines of code live on the production system within weeks. You’ll be doing real work that really matters from the outset.

To help you settle in, you’ll be surrounded by some of the best (and friendliest) engineers from around the world, and you’ll learn faster than you can imagine.

You’ll be working in a company that is growing fast, and with that comes huge opportunity for real career progression. And we’re not talking gold stars and a name badge. We’re talking about responsibility and input.

You’ll earn a competitive starting salary in a package including share options in the company. That means you share in the success that you help us achieve.

What you'll need

  • You’ll either have, or have been predicted, at least a 2:1 from a leading university in Computer Science, Maths or a science or engineering discipline from a leading university.
  • You'll need to already have some nifty coding skills, particularly in Java.
  • You'll be passionate about technology and have the ability to learn quickly.

One of our success stories

Paul Nichols went from graduate to lead developer in no time:

After completing my Computer Science Degree in 2009 at Oxford I joined the Geonomics Java Development Team – working here has been my first graduate job! Despite my lack of initial experience I have gained so much experience in such a huge range of subjects from front end development to writing database queries. When I started at Geonomics I was only one of five developers but the team has gone on to grow and I have established myself as an integral part of the team. I currently work on high priority code, sometimes in high pressure situations.

Opportunities at Geonomics

If you're passionate and analytical, we want to talk to you.
